game.name: The Doppel
game.shortDescription: The Doppel is a single player 2D action game.The player controls the protagonist, a failed novelist, and tries to recover his lost precious feelings while running away from the 'doppel' that pursues him in the dream world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Doppel is a single player 2D action game.The player controls the protagonist, a failed novelist, and tries to recover his lost precious feelings while running away from the 'doppel' that pursues him in the dream world.
